data.professionalSummary: Accomplished Senior IT Manager with over 11 years of progressive leadership experience in the Information Technology sector, specializing in strategic infrastructure management, digital transformation, and cross-functional team leadership. Proven track record of managing multi-million dollar IT budgets, leading international teams, and driving operational efficiency across global manufacturing environments. Expert in vendor relationship management, change management, and implementing complex IT infrastructures including ERP systems (Sage X3, SAP), cloud computing (Microsoft Azure), and data analytics platforms (Power BI, SQL). Demonstrated ability to bridge business requirements with technical solutions while mentoring technical teams and managing organizational transitions. Strong background in performance management, budget administration, and employee development with certifications in strategic management and data-driven decision making.

experience.responsibilities: Led comprehensive development and implementation of real-time production measurement systems utilizing Azure SQL databases and Power BI analytics dashboards, managing a team of technical specialists while overseeing project budgets exceeding $500K. Architected and deployed complex redundant backup infrastructure featuring Nutanix hyperconverged systems, collaborating with international vendors and managing multi-site implementations. Implemented advanced monitoring solutions using Grafana for real-time system performance tracking and MongoDB databases for scalable data management. Spearheaded digital transformation initiatives including digital signage software development, managing stakeholder expectations and ensuring seamless integration across manufacturing departments.

Directed comprehensive IT infrastructure development for ESP pump manufacturing operations from plant inception through organizational transition, managing cross-cultural teams and international vendor relationships. Led strategic planning initiatives for technology roadmap development while overseeing annual IT budgets and resource allocation. Designed and implemented cutting-edge Cisco network infrastructures, managed strategic IT vendor negotiations, and successfully deployed integrated security systems including IP CCTV and access control solutions. Architected and deployed Sage X3 ERP system integration, developed custom internal applications using C++ and modern web technologies, and established efficient IT governance processes. Implemented Microsoft Azure cloud migration strategies, SQL Server database optimization, and Active Directory infrastructure redesign. Managed organizational change during company restructuring, ensuring seamless technology integration and maintaining operational excellence while mentoring junior IT staff.

experience.location: Ciénega de Flores, Nuevo León, Mexico
experience.responsibilities: Managed dual responsibilities encompassing comprehensive IT operations and industrial automation engineering, leading technical teams while coordinating with production management. Directed IT infrastructure operations including database management, networking, helpdesk supervision, software development oversight, server administration, and ERP system management. Simultaneously managed all PLC programming initiatives, maintenance schedules, and provided technical leadership for Pipe Forming Laser Machine operations and Panasonic robotics systems. Established training programs, managed vendor relationships, and developed SOPs for technical operations. Coordinated with Korean headquarters for technology transfer and international project management.
keyAchievements: Successfully deployed Manufacturing Execution System (MES) enhancing production visibility
Designed and implemented comprehensive network infrastructure from ground up
Deployed and configured VMware virtual server environments optimizing resource utilization
Developed and launched company website (daehanmexico.com.mx) with full domain administration

Implemented automated PLC backup systems ensuring data integrity

experience.responsibilities: Administered comprehensive technology infrastructure including ERP systems, SAP implementations, database management, networking operations, server maintenance, access control systems, and CCTV operations. Ensured optimal performance and security of all technology assets across the organization.

Coordinated IT asset management and provided technical support services across corporate headquarters and nationwide network of over 250 retail locations. Managed inventory tracking, deployment logistics, and provided comprehensive technical assistance to ensure operational continuity across all facilities.
